## Impact Assessment
**How does this change current recommendations?**

- [ ] No change to core recommendations
- [ ] Refinement of existing protocol
- [ ] Significant change to treatment approach

## Backward Compatibility
**How does this affect existing users?**

- [ ] No impact - additive information only
- [ ] Clarification - doesn't change practice
- [ ] Minor adjustment - easy to adopt
- [ ] Significant change - requires review of current cases

## Urgency
**How urgent is this update?**

- [ ] Critical - Immediate safety concern
- [ ] High - Significant improvement to patient outcomes
- [ ] Medium - Important but not urgent
- [ ] Low - Minor update or clarification
